mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BigReply (debateId, board, memberId) VALUES (#{debateId}, #{board}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.debateId, r.board, m.nickName writerNickName, r.inserted, IF (m.id = #{memberId}, 1, 0) own FROM BigReply r JOIN Member m ON r.memberId = m.id WHERE r.debateId = #{debateId} ORDER BY r.id
